changes.change: Custom developer identities are now detected correctly Integrated new iOS 13 context menus, homescreen shortcuts & haptic feedbacks Added pull to refresh to Featured tab Added French translation (thanks to DzMohaipa) Added Indonesian translation (thanks to Am1nCmd) Added Javanese (Indonesia) translation (thanks to EskaseptianTeam) Fixed bug where links were not clickable in News Removed the (deprecated) option to link device via email Various other minor fixes and additions
